newsitem.title: USA: Sun Communities files $272.8 mln shelf offer.
newsitem.headline: Sun Communities files $272.8 mln shelf offer.

text.p: Sun Communities Inc and its operating partnership filed a shelf registration with the Securities and Exchange Commission for up to $272.8 million in debt and equity securities.
Of the total, Sun Communities said it plans to offer up to $47.8 million in debt securities, preferred and common shares and securities warrants.
Sun Communities Operating LP, plans to offer up to $225 million of its own debt securities.

In addition to the amounts being registered, Sun Communities still has $202.2 million in debt securities, preferred and common stock and securities warrants available for sale under previous registration statements. Its operating partnership also has up to $25 million of debt securities still available for sale from previous registrations.
Net proceeds from Sun Communities' offerings will be invested in the operating partnership.

The operating partnership in turn will use those proceeds, plus those raised from its sale of its own debt securities for general business purposes. Those purposes, also include development and acquisition of additional properties, payment of debt and improvement of properties in the company's portfolio.
